bill.title: Commission on Judicial Performance; require to file complaint with The Mississippi Bar.
bill.description: An Act To Create Code Section 9-19-16, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide That When A Recommendation Of Removal Or Public Reprimand Of Any Justice Or Judge, Who Is A Licensed Attorney, Is Made By The Commission On Judicial Performance, Such Commission Shall File A Separate Formal Complaint With The Mississippi Bar Against Such Justice Or Judge; To Amend Section 9-19-17, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Clarify That Any Justice Or Judge, Who Is A Licensed Attorney, May Be Suspended Or Disbarred From Practicing Law In This State; To Amend Section 9-19-29, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Conform To The Preceding Section; To Amend Reenacted Sections 73-3-309, 73-3-321 And 73-3-323, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide That Complaints Filed With The Complaint Tribunal Shall Be Treated As Any Other Complaint That Is Filed With The Complaint Tribunal; To Amend Reenacted Section 73-3-327, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Conform To The Preceding Sections; To Amend Section 73-3-403, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Extend The Date Of Repeal On The Provision Of Law That Creates The State Board Of Bar Commissioners; To Reenact Sections 73-3-101, 73-3-103, 73-3-105, 73-3-107, 73-3-109, 73-3-111, 73-3-113, 73-3-115, 73-3-117, 73-3-119, 73-3-120, 73-3-121, 73-3-123, 73-3-125, 73-3-129, 73-3-131, 73-3-133, 73-3-135, 73-3-137, 73-3-139, 73-3-140, 73-3-143, 73-3-171, 73-3-301, 73-3-303, 73-3-305, 73-3-307, 73-3-310, 73-3-311, 73-3-313, 73-3-315, 73-3-317, 73-3-319, 73-3-325, 73-3-329, 73-3-331, 73-3-333, 73-3-335, 73-3-337, 73-3-339, 73-3-343, 73-3-345, 73-3-347, 73-3-349, 73-3-351, 73-3-353, 73-3-355, 73-3-357, 73-3-359, 73-3-361, 73-3-363, 73-3-365, 73-3-367, 73-3-369, 73-3-371 And 73-3-373, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Create The State Board Of Bar Commissioners; And For Related Purposes.
